name: TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse, Antigingivitis, Clean Mint Flavor, Dentist Formulated to Help Prevent Gingivitis and Support Gum Health, Alcohol Free, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
short_description: Two 16 fl oz bottles of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse in a Clean Mint flavor; this antigingivitis, antiplaque mouthwash is dentist formulated and alcohol free
TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse is a non-burning mouthwash that helps reduce plaque that leads to bleeding gums and gingivitis, an early form of gum disease
Every swish of this TheraBreath mouth rinse in a refreshing Clean Mint flavor supports gum health in a formula that is certified vegan, gluten free, halal, and kosher, and has BPA-free packaging
This alcohol-free gingivitis mouthwash freshens your breath without the burn; it contains no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens; and is not tested on animals

As part of your gum health routine to help prevent early gum disease, this mouthwash has a powerful CPC (Cetylpyridinium chloride) formula that kills bacteria linked to gum disease to help fight gingivitis for 12 hours
For best results, adults and children 12 years and older should vigorously swish 4 teaspoons (20 mL) of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse between teeth twice a day for 30 seconds and then spit out
product_description: Get the gum care you deserve with every swish of TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse with a refreshing Clean Mint flavor. This alcohol-free, non-burning mouthwash helps reduce plaque that leads to bleeding gums and early gum disease. It’s formulated with CPC (Cetylpyridinium chloride), which is clinically shown to help fight gingivitis, an early form of gum disease. It provides gum care in an antiplaque, antigingivitis formula that helps fight gingivitis for 12 hours. TheraBreath Healthy Gums gingivitis mouthwash has no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens. Adults and children 12 years or older can swish 4 teaspoons (20 mL) between teeth for 30 seconds two times a day. Do not use for children younger than 6 years of age. TheraBreath Healthy Gums Oral Rinse is not tested on animals and is certified gluten-free, vegan, Kosher, and Halal. It’s 100 percent guaranteed, so you can confidently add it to your oral care routine for a clean mouth. It’s swishy time with TheraBreath, the best-selling alcohol-free mouthwash brand in the USA (based on units sold, Circana, L13wks 2/2/25).

short_description: 【Travel Toothbrush】This travel toothbrushes with mint toothpaste. Each flavor comes with mint, providing a cool sensation when used. Mint flavor is cool and refreshing, making it full of vitality when used in the morning, making brushing teeth a pleasant enjoyment. ​

【No Rinsing Necessary】After being lightly bitten, freshening bead fuse with saliva and can be harmlessly absorbed by the human body while cleaning the mouth, without the need for additional rinsing. Whether it's rushing in the morning or finding a water source outside after a meal, you can quickly complete oral cleaning, eliminating the need for rinsing and making the cleaning process more efficient and worry free.

【Compact & Portable】With a small size, it is easy to carry, each of our mini toothbrushes are individually wrapped. product_description: Say bye-bye to bad breath with TheraBreath Fresh Breath Oral Rinse. This alcohol-free, non-burning mouthwash is pH-balanced and starts working instantly to fight bad breath for 12 hours. It’s a powerful breath freshener with xylitol that’s dentist-formulated and ADA-accepted to kill odor-causing bacteria. This bad breath mouthwash has no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens. Adults can rinse and gargle with 2 teaspoons (10 mL) two times a day after brushing; children ages 12-17 can rinse and gargle with 2 teaspoons (10 mL) once daily after brushing. Made in the USA, Fresh Breath is not tested on animals and is certified gluten-free, vegan, Kosher, and Halal.
